name: 10mg: HANDMADEDE-ATHLABYRINTH issue 0
description:
10mg is a collection of 10 minute long games.

HANDMADEDEATHLABYRINTH issue 0 is one of them: an unforgiving little adventure full of monsters that should take about 10 minutes to finish. From start to end, you'll get a specific, singular expression of the dungeon crawl experience; the hero's journey is to descend into the depths, ignoring their fears, and return a different person. What will you find down there?

What you'll find in the labyrinth
  • One sword.
  • One dungeon to crawl that stays the same every time you die.
  • Anything else you find down there, you keep.
Listen to the OFFICIALSOUNDTRACK!
